item.dc:creator: leo
item.description: Patch release for Home Assistant 2022.12 compatibility No new features just yet, only a hotfix for compatibility with HA 2022.12.x A new version of Music Assistant containing the announced new features will be provided somewhere in December and is a bit delayed due to both personal reasons and the fact its a bit more work […]
item.content:encoded:
Patch release for Home Assistant 2022.12 compatibility

No new features just yet, only a hotfix for compatibility with HA 2022.12.x

A new version of Music Assistant containing the announced new features will be provided somewhere in December and is a bit delayed due to both personal reasons and the fact its a bit more work than expected.

https://github.com/music-assistant/hass-music-assistant/releases

item.dc:creator: leo
item.description: No new features just yet, only a hotfix for compatibility with HA 2022.11.x ONLY INSTALL THIS PATCH VERSION ON HOME ASSISTANT 2022.11.X AND NOT WHEN YOU’RE STILL ON HA VERSION 2022.10 OR BELOW !!! A new version of Music Assistant with actual new features will be provided in December (beta end of November).
item.content:encoded:
No new features just yet, only a hotfix for compatibility with HA 2022.11.x

ONLY INSTALL THIS PATCH VERSION ON HOME ASSISTANT 2022.11.X AND NOT WHEN YOU’RE STILL ON HA VERSION 2022.10 OR BELOW !!!

A new version of Music Assistant with actual new features will be provided in December (beta end of November).

https://github.com/music-assistant/hass-music-assistant/releases
